description:
From our law office in Southfield, Michigan, the attorneys at Moss & Colella provide invaluable counsel and support to clients throughout Oakland County and the surrounding areas of the Detroit metro region. We help those who are dealing with complex, pressing legal challenges arising from any of the following:

  • Police brutality and excessive force
  • Wrongful arrest
  • Civil rights violations
  • Coronavirus whistleblower claims
  • Workplace discrimination, sexual harassment and other workplace grievances
  • Education discrimination and harassment
  • Personal injury and wrongful death
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Dog bites
  • Medical malpractice
  • Construction site accidents
  • Slip-and-fall accidents

Our lawyers possess decades of combined legal experience, and we have achieved remarkable success advocating on behalf of individuals, families and others victimized by another party's negligent, careless or unlawful actions. Over the course of our history, we have secured substantial settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, including several $10 million awards for the family of victims shot or killed by police.

We have also recovered many multimillion-dollar awards for our accident victim clients, and we promise to do all we can to increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you deserve. Our lawyers have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers. Perhaps more meaningful, our law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To begin the process of achieving justice in the wake of a preventable tragedy or serious violation of your protected rights, you can contact Moss & Colella to schedule a free initial consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.
